amendatorysection.catchline: City of the primary or metropolitan class; annual report.
amendatorysection.para: On or before December 1, 2020, and annually thereafter, each city of the primary class and city of the metropolitan class shall make a report listing the number of untested sexual assault evidence collection kits for such city. The report shall contain aggregate data only and shall not contain any personal identifying information. The report shall be made publicly available on the city's web site and shall be electronically submitted to the Attorney General and to the Legislature.
